name: Shoot them Dice!
description:
Shoot Them Dice is a short shmup game in which you play as a dice flying through space while other evil green dices try to kill you.

You can roll your dice around and both the enemy shots and your shots change depending on which side is facing up. For example, when the side with a 5 is up, you are immune to dices with 5 side up and can only damage enemies with the 5 side up. The rolling of the dice works just like a real 3D dice.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2022. It's really short. Everything was done by myself.
